Module org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap

Interface ActionGroup

All Superinterfaces:
BootstrapElement<Tag,ActionGroup>, Markup, NamedItemsContainer, Producer
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionGroupImpl
public interface ActionGroup extends BootstrapElement<Tag,ActionGroup>, NamedItemsContainer
Interface for building List groups with actions - div container, link elements.
Author:
Pavel Vlasov

      Tag getContentDiv()
